message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90%, you get 10%. It's a good start, right?
You took 90% in round 1, now it's my turn to take a bigger share
Okay, I'll take 60% this time, but it's my last offer before I take it all next round. Be reasonable, Bob.
You're trying to take it all, but I'm not going down without a fight. Meet me in the middle
